title: Brazilian Lemonade (With Limes and Condensed Milk) Recipe
full_text:
Brazilian Lemonade (With Limes and Condensed Milk) Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
15 mins
Active
15 mins
Total
15 mins
Serves
4
to 6 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/2
cup
juice from
about
10
limes
or
5
lemons
3/4
cup
sweetened condensed milk
Pinch
salt
3
cups
cold
water
1
quart
ice
Directions
Combine lemon or lime juice, condensed milk, salt, and water in a blender. Blend until homogenous and frothy, about 30 seconds. Transfer to a pitcher. Add ice. Serve immediately.
Special Equipment
Blender
Non-Alcoholic Drinks
Brazilian
Lime
Condensed Milk
